alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Forsyth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 03 at 11:37PM EST until February 04 at 8:26PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Etowah River near Dawsonville affecting Dawson and Forsyth Counties. For the Etowah River Basin...including Landrum, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Free Home, Barrettsville, Ball Ground, Northeast Canton, East Canton Downstream I-575, Canton, Waleska, Woodstock, Big Shanty/Kennesaw, Blackwells, Woodstock, Kennesaw, Mars Hill, Below Allatoona Dam, Rockmart, Cartersville, Dallas, Kingston, Kingston, Rome GA 1 Loop, Rome Coosa Valley FG... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Etowah River near Dawsonville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 14 feet, flooding begins in northwest Forsyth county. Old Federal Road begins to flood and Nicholson Road is closed off to residents. Minor flooding continues in south Dawson county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 15 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 13 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
